tool_description: An API to quickly convert a postcode into a What3Words address.
name: What3WordsConverter
title: What3WordsConverter

api_list.name: convert-single-postcode
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://what3wordsconverter.p.rapidapi.com/convert-postcode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "what3wordsconverter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://what3wordsconverter.p.rapidapi.com/convert-postcode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "what3wordsconverter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
